mapper.select: select count(*) from wbs where manager = #{manager}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO works a USING dual ON (a.workcode = #{workcode}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET a.apprmsg = #{apprmsg}, a.compmsg = #{compmsg}, a.apprdate = sysdate WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT values(#{workcode},#{apprmsg},#{compmsg},sysdate)

merge into workfile a using dual on (a.workcode = #{workcode}) when matched then update set a.fname = #{fname} a.regdate = sysdate, a.uptdate = sysdate when not matched then insert values(#{workcode}, #{fname},sysdate,sysdate)
